welcome_message_body: Welcome to Massy, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and delicious food. We invite you to explore and savor all that our city has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time in Massy!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals and serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mostly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow or unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
